value.title: Using Custom Format Strings in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: Patrick walks you through how to use custom format strings in Power BI Desktop. From dates and time to numbers, he calls out some things to look out for.  Custom Format String Documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/desktop-custom-format-strings  Download sample file: https://guyinacu.be/customformatstringsample
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/72qQrPw4RuE" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Using different languages with the Power BI site
value.excerpt: I look at how your browser languages affect what is displayed. This all comes down to your browsers and the language settings within. Different browsers are configured differently. Fiddler can show you what your language order is.  SUBSCRIBE! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFp1vaKzpfvoGai0vE5VJ0w?sub_confirmation=1
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/RqWyA9mD-Yk" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: What the heck are BUILD PERMISSIONS in Power BI?!?
value.excerpt: Adam look at Power BI build permissions with shared datasets. Taking the mystery out of how you can interact with datasets and know what to do if you can't use it. This also looks at how Power BI free users can use shared datasets with Power BI Premium.  ******** LET'S CONNECT! ********  -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/3c7pMFloNeI" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: What's this Power BI report filtered by???
value.excerpt: Struggling with understanding what is filtering your visual or Power BI report? Patrick walks you through how you can tell what is going on.  SQLBI Filter Context: https://www.sqlbi.com/articles/displaying-filter-context-in-power-bi-tooltips/  📢 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership   *******************

value.title: When is a date not a date in Power BI?
value.excerpt: When is a date not a date? We all use them in our data. Patrick looks at how data types can be a tricky thing in Power BI. Be aware of what you are working with in order to avoid this problem in your charts.  📢 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership   *******************  Want to take your

value.title: Who doesn't like FREE Power BI training??? (2022)
value.excerpt: There are a lot of free Power BI training options out there for business analysts and there is now training beyond that for your organization. Adam explores the latest free options that Microsoft has to grow and learn Power BI!  Matthew's Blog: https://ssbipolar.com/2021/06/07/free-power-bi-intro-training-from-microsoft/

value.title: Why isn't my Agg hitting when using DISTINCTCOUNT in Power BI???
value.excerpt: Using Aggregations in Power BI? Have some DISTINCTCOUNT in your measures? Wondering why the queries are slow and not hitting the aggs? Patrick shows you what is going on! Get ready for some DAX fusion!  DAX Fusion: https://dax.tips/2019/08/05/dax-fusion/  Aggregations Documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/transform-model/aggregations-advanced
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/lTkWAfrMwOg" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Working with images in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick shows you how to work with images in Power BI. He isn't talking about adding a logo into your report. This looks at how you can integrate visuals in your visuals based on your data.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube -- http://www.facebook.com/guyinacube

value.title: Advanced Power BI Bookmark Options (Data/Display/Current Page)
value.excerpt: If you use Power BI Bookmarks you may not have used the advanced bookmarking options for  ➔ Bookmark Data ➔ Bookmark Display  ➔ Bookmark Current Page I talk about these options and show you were these can really help you out when using Power BI Bookmarks in advanced scenarios.  ================================

value.title: DAX Measures: Filter Context Explained in Simple Terms using the I.C.A.N. Principle
value.excerpt: For Power BI DAX Measures, one of the hardest concepts to grasp is the Filter Context. Or is it? I explain the “Filter Context” using the 4-easy step approach of the I.C.A.N. Principle. ==  I. Incoming Filters ==  C. CALCULATE does it’s Magic! ==  A. Apply relationships (filters flow Across relationships)
